Receive secret key reject secret key Del (or D) - Delete\nR - Reply\nA - Reply All\nC - Write New Message\nF - Repost\nM - Move\nV - File\nY - Copy\nZ - Mark as read/Unread\nG - Star\nO - Sort category\nI - Sort order\nQ - Back to file folder\nS - select/Cancel select\nJ or P - Last message\nK or N - Next message 1 - Only display First Level file Folder\n2 - Display First & Secondary Level file Folders\n3 -
